name: Verify that if the document type was not marked mandatory in the defaults documents page, no is displayed or it is left empty
justification: This test checks for non-critical validation related to UI fields. It is important but does not involve core business processes, integrations, or security.

name: Verify that date of upload is displayed on the table
justification: This test verifies a display element which is important for user interaction but not critical to core functionality, security, or calculations.

name: Verify that the table displays Action Column and a delete icon is displayed
justification: This test checks for the presence of a critical UI function (delete), which is essential for data management. It has some level of impact on core functionality and usability.

name: Verify there is a Auto-cascade tab appears when shift fulfilment and 2 week is enabled
justification: Checks for a feature (Auto-cascade) that impacts numerous processes within shift management. This involves integrations and is core to shift functionalities.

name: Verify there is a defaults to copy section at the top
justification: This checks for a specific UI functionality that ensures proper setup for cascade operations. Though not directly critical, it aids in the accuracy of configurations.

name: Verify there is a job type dropdown
justification: This test verifies a vital UI component for job configuration. Correct job type selection is critical for proper shift assignment and downstream processes.

name: Verify Jobtype dropdown shows job types related to the client
justification: Ensures job type dropdown is filtered correctly based on client settings. This involves integrations and is critical for accurate job assignments and processing.

name: Verify jobtype dropdown defaults to all jobtypes on initial load
justification: This test addresses default settings which are important but not critical to core functionality or security.

name: Verify user can multiselect from jobtype dropdown
justification: Multiselect functionality in a dropdown is important for user efficiency and accuracy in large datasets. Affects user experience and efficiency.

name: Verify when jobtypes are selected the bottom table filters based on selection
justification: This deals with a critical aspect of filtering the information based on user selections, which involves interactions between multiple components.

name: Verify the agency tiers displayed is based on number of tiers in additional information tab
justification: Ensures that tier information is accurate based on configurations. This is important for data consistency and business logic.

name: Verify tier 1 is defaulted to Immediate
justification: Default settings check which is important but not critical. Verifies user expectation for default configurations.

name: Verify only numeric entries can be made in tiers field
justification: This test involves validation crucial for preventing erroneous data entry, significantly affecting data integrity and error mitigation.

name: Verify min value is 1 and max value is 999
justification: Validation of numeric fields ensures data integrity and correct user input. Important for business rule enforcement.

name: Verify the copy functionality
justification: Checks an important but non-critical feature related to data duplication and management. This aids in data usability and user efficiency.

name: Verify auto cascade table exist in the auto cascade tab
justification: This test ensures the presence of a critical feature for managing shift assignments, affecting usability and integration.

name: Verify the name of columns in Auto cascade table
justification: Naming and labeling are important for clarity but do not affect core functionality or security.

name: Verfiy the information displayed in the table columns
justification: Accuracy of displayed information is crucial for user decision-making and data integrity. Important but not highly critical.

name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details contains the currency symbol.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

 In the timesheet details section >

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.
justification: Correct display of currency symbols is important for financial accuracy and user clarity, impacting financial processing but not core security.

name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details on the adjustment page contains the currency symbol.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.
justification: Similar to UNO-T346, this ensures financial accuracy and correct display, affecting processing but not core security.

name: As a client user verify that the timesheet details on the adjustment page contains the currency symbol when adding/ removing hours.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client with Create Adjustments and Enter Timesheets permission.

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page > timesheet ID entered. 

Then:

  • Confirm that the hourly rate fields display the correct currency relevant to the location. 

  • Confirm that the total fields display the correct currency relevant to the location.
justification: Adding/removing hours with correct currency display is crucial for financial calculations and user accuracy. Significant but not highly critical.

name: As an Agency User verify that the timesheet details on the adjustments table
testScript:
Given 

  • Logged in as an agency user with View Adjustments Permission 

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page

Then 

  • Check that there is a currency column on the table.

  • The currency displayed is relevant to the location that is selected.

  • The currency column displays the relevant currency that the client is set up with.
justification: Ensures the relevant currency display, important for financial transactions and user clarity. Involves validation and calculation.

name: As an Agency User Verify that currency of the export of timesheet adjustment page.
testScript:
Given 

  • Logged in as an agency user with View Adjustments Permission 

When:

  • One the timesheet adjustment page

Then

  • When the table is exported confirm that the currency column is also exported. 

  • The currency symbol should be displayed as the relevant currency the agency is set up with.

  • The currency symbol should (GBP, EUR) change dependent on the country selected.
justification: Export functionality with correct currency symbols is crucial for financial reporting and data accuracy. Impacts data manipulation and user clarity.

name: Verify Auto cascade tab shows when enable shift and 2week or both is enabled
justification: This test checks a feature that affects multiple processes within shift management and involves integration, making it high priority.

name: Verify the tiers are in line with the tiers defined in the display agency in tiers additional information
justification: Ensures accuracy of tier information, important for data consistency and correct business logic.
